column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I flew to Iceland one year on vacation .
#text=I left JFK airport in New York and flew to Keflavik in Iceland .
#text=I parked in long term parking and then took a shuttle to actual terminals .
#text=I felt so nervous that I would n't make my flight !
#text=I was so afraid beforehand of getting my bag lost that I just packed everything I needed into a small carry on bag .
#text=I checked in and then went to security .
#text=Security moved along quickly and I was waiting at my gate to catch my flight .
#text=While I was waiting , I had a beer at a restaurant .
#text=A roach fell on my husband who was with me !
#text=We quietly called our server over and she stepped on it and told us it happens all the time !
#text=It actually made us want to get on the plane even quicker and get out of there .
#text=Finally , we boarded the plane and were seated next to some nice people from Oregon .
#text=We chatted a bit with them and I watched an in-flight movie of Jane Eyre .
